data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - The Agency
data.detailed_description:
Big or small, every mystery needs a detective to solve it. And every detective needs a proper music theme.

The Agency was inspired by a variety of detective and crime fiction - from classic Sherlock Holmes to the modern police procedural, there's a theme for every setting. Composed by Murray Atkinson, this unique set of orchestral music provides a perfect backdrop for solving mysteries.

This pack contains:
  • 27 masterfully-composed songs.
  • Themes range from Victorian Sherlock-inspired pieces to modern crime scene investigative jazz.
  • Includes several spy themes, perfect for accompanying incredible heists!
  • .wav, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
